pma:database.name: phpmy1_pizarronesguadalajara_com
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `historial_inv_zuno` ( `idhistorial_inv_zuno` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `fecha_hora` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `codigo_prod` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_spanish2_ci DEFAULT NULL, `exist_actual` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `exist_nueva` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tipo` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_spanish2_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idhistorial_inv_zuno`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_spanish2_ci;
